name: The Adventure of Glue Man
description:
The Adventures of Glue Man stars none other than, you guessed it, Glue Man! Maneuver your way through tricky obstacles, battle aliens, and survive as long as you can in this exciting adventure. Of course, do all of this, while possessing the powers of Glue! Shoot at your enemies to freeze them and stick to certain objects. Each run is endurance based, with only three hitpoints, see how far you can go! Levels are pulled from a random pool, so each run will be different. 

---Credits--- 

Created by Dylan DeCastro

Art by Ella Jahnke
